description:
Hi-Speed USB 2.0 & eSATAExternal Hard DrivesAcomData pureDrive is the perfect solution for those who want nothing more than pure, high-performance data storage. Conveniently store all of your tunes, your pics, your flicks--and all of your other digital files--in one compact, portable package.FeaturesHi-Speed USB 2.0Transfer data at blazing speeds up to 480 Mbps. Compatible with USB 1.1.eSATATransfer rates up to 1.5 Gbps. That's almost twice as fast as FireWire 800.Perfect solution for:high-end graphics; storing digital video, photos & music; desktop publishing; backupsVertical & HorizontalAdhesive rubber feet and slide-on stand included.StackableAdd even more storage without taking up more desktop space.On-Off SwitchTurn the Drive on only when you need it and save electricity.Mac & Pc readyWorks on both Mac and PC right out of the box .Security lock slotPhysically secure your Drive to prevent theft (security lock not included).Near-Silent OperationThe pureDrive dissipates heat so efficiently it doesn't need a fan.Product Sheet(includes full specifications)Download the full-color Product Sheet (PDF: 462 KB)

Frequently Asked Questions"What's faster, USB 2.0 or eSATA?" "Can I use a USB 1 connection with a USB 2.0 Drive?"For answers to these and other common questions about AcomData E5 Hard Drives, clickhere.ConfigurationsModel No.CapacityRotational SpeedCache (Buffer)Seek Time(Read, typical)Interface Transfer RatePDHD160USE-72160 GB7200 RPM8 MB8.5 msHi-Speed USB 2.0:Up to 480 Mbps. Up to 12 Mbps if using a USB 1.1 port.eSATA:Up to 1.5 Gbps (1500 Mbps).PDHD250USE-72250 GB7200 RPM8 MB8.5 msPDHD320USE-72320 GB7200 RPM8 MB8.5 msPDHD400USE-72400 GB7200 RPM8 MB8.5 msPDHD500USE-72500 GB7200 RPM8 MB8.5 msPDHD750USE-72750 GB7200 RPM16 MB8.5 msPDHD1000USE-721 TB7200 RPM16 MB8.5 msSystem RequirementsWindows PCsMinimum 233 MHz processor• Windows Vista(Ultimate, Premium, Basic, Business and Enterprise)• Windows XP(Home, Pro, pro x64, Media Center and Tablet PC)• Windows 2000• Windows ME• Windows 98SEFree USB 2.0 or USB 1.1 port OR a free eSATA port*MacG3, G4, G5 or Intel processorMac OS 10.2 or laterFree USB 2.0 or USB 1.1 port OR a free eSATA port** eSATA cable not included.Easy InstallationInstallation involves nothing more than connecting the supplied USB 2.0 or an eSATA cable (not included), plugging in the power cord, and turning on the Drive. Simple. Easy. And just like the Drive itself--very fast.Users of Windows 98SE and 2000 (SP3 or earlier) will need to install the supplied USB 2.0 driver.Package ContentsAcomData pureDrive Model 761 External Hard DriveStandUSB 2.0 cable (USB 1 compatible)AC adapter and power cordCD(Contains User's Guide and USB 2.0 driver for Win98SE and Win2000-pre SP4)Quick Start GuideWarranty Registration CardWarrantyOne year limited warranty
title: AcomData PureDrive 500 GB USB 2.0/eSATA External Hard Drive PHD500USE-72
